LanguageData.AwokenCorpse.label: awoken unnatural corpse
LanguageData.AwokenCorpse.description: The energy building within this corpse is erupting. It has risen and is attacking with increasing power and speed. It will not stop until it reaches its victim.
LanguageData.AwokenCorpse.comps.HediffComp_MessageSta: The unnatural corpse is moving faster!
LanguageData.Ghoul.label: ghoul
LanguageData.Ghoul.description:
This person has been implanted with an archotech shard, twisting them into a jittering murder machine. Its body is an amalgam of flesh and metal, while its mind cycles between half-conscious stupor and murderous intent.

They cannot work; they only fight. Ghouls must eat raw meat. If they go hungry, they can turn hostile.

Many find ghouls' constant twitching to be disturbing, even when they aren't killing someone.
LanguageData.GhoulFrenzy.label: ghoul frenzy
LanguageData.GhoulFrenzy.description: This creature's blood is saturated with stress hormones and liquid energy, permitting it to move and attack at incredible speeds for a short time.
LanguageData.MeatHunger.label: meat hunger
LanguageData.MeatHunger.description: This creature is ravenously hungry for raw meat. It may become hostile if it gets too hungry.
LanguageData.MeatHunger.stages.initial.label: initial
LanguageData.MeatHunger.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.MeatHunger.stages.extreme.label: extreme
LanguageData.RapidRegeneration.label: rapid regeneration
LanguageData.RapidRegeneration.description: This creature has stored an incredible amount of healing energy. While not unlimited, it will rapidly regenerate until its energy has been exhausted.
LanguageData.ResurrectionComa.label: resurrection coma
LanguageData.ResurrectionComa.description: A mixture of deadlife dust and advanced biochemicals course through this creatureâ€™s veins.
LanguageData.Rising.label: rising
LanguageData.Rising.description: Mysterious archotechnological influences are reanimating this creature's corpse.
LanguageData.Shambler.label: shambler
LanguageData.Shambler.description: This dead creature has been re-animated by corrupted archites. Shamblers are slow and mindless, and will attack any living creature relentlessly. After a few days on their feet, shamblers die from metabolic exhaustion. Captured shamblers can't move and thus won't expire.
LanguageData.ShamblerCorpse.label: shambler corpse
LanguageData.ShamblerCorpse.description: This creature had previously been re-animated by corrupted archites.
